}} 'Cefamandole' (INN, also known as 'cephamandole') is a second-generation broad-
spectrum cephalosporin antibiotic. The clinically used form of cefamandole is
the formate ester 'cefamandole nafate', a prodrug which is administered .

Cefamandole is no longer available in the United States.
